output_list.reason: The mintToken function allows an overflow of the total supply due to a missing overflow check.
The transferFrom function has a logical error in the condition for verifying sufficient funds, allowing unauthorized transfers.
The claimThrone function uses predictable winner selection without secure randomness, enabling exploitation.
The transfer function does not check if the target address is a smart contract, allowing unauthorized users to transfer funds to their accounts.
The mintToken function allows the owner to mint an unlimited amount of tokens, devaluing the token.
